      Methods in org.apache.archiva.redback.rbac that return Permission 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Permission RBACManager.createPermission(String name)
      Creates an implementation specific Permission, or return an existing Permission, depending on the provided name parameter.
      Permission RBACManager.createPermission(String name, String operationName, String resourceIdentifier)
      Creates an implementation specific Permission with specified Operation, and Resource identifiers.

      List<? extends Permission> RBACManager.getAllPermissions() 
      Map<String,List<? extends Permission>> RBACManager.getAssignedPermissionMap(String principal)
      returns a map of assigned permissions keyed off of operation with a list value of Permissions
      Map<String,List<? extends Permission>> AbstractRBACManager.getAssignedPermissionMap(String principal)
      returns a map of assigned permissions keyed off of operations
      Set<? extends Permission> RBACManager.getAssignedPermissions(String principal)
      returns a set of all permissions that are in all active roles for a given principal
      Set<? extends Permission> AbstractRBACManager.getAssignedPermissions(String principal)
      returns a set of all permissions that are in all active roles for a given principal
